archiefmat.titel: Stukken tot opheffing der slavernij in West-IndiëÂ«
archiefmat.titel_eng: Documents concerning the Emancipation in the West Indies
archiefmat.notes:
Nos. 223-237: Suriname; nos. 238-245: Curaçao; no. 246: Bonaire, Aruba, Saba; no. 247: St Eustatius and St Martin; no. 248: lists of compensation to slaves and slave owners in Suriname, St Martin, Curaçao, Aruba, Bonaire, Saba and St Eustatius.

A digital index of these inventory numbers is available including the names of the emancipated slaves and their former owners, see Nationaal Archief (NA) website, Collectie - Indexen.
